publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4553 Brian Adam: No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to lobby the Chancellor of the Exchequer to ensure that none of the costs of the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route incur Value Added Tax.
S2M-4553 No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (lodged on 14 June 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Christine Grahame*, Fergus Ewing*, Mike Rumbles*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-4553 Brian Adam: No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route—That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to lobby the Chancellor of the Exchequer to ensure that none of the costs of the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route incur Value Added Tax. Supported by: Richard Lochhead, Christine Grahame, Fergus Ewing, Mike Rumbles, Ms Maureen Watt, Ms Sandra White, Mr Stewart Maxwell*
S2M-4553 No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (lodged on 14 June 2006) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-4553 No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (lodged on 14 June 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-4553 No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (lodged on 14 June 2006) Dave Petrie*, Alex Neil*
S2M-4553 No VAT on the Aberdeen Western Peripheral Route (lodged on 14 June 2006) Roseanna Cunningham* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
